SKT_FIRST.name: Pretzel
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>35%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. (Applied 2 times)
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>35%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>2個を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>35%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 부여합니다. (2회 적용)
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>35%</color>的几率对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。(可叠加2次)

SKT_SECOND.name: Pilgrimage
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. Performs an <color=#28d9ed>additional attack</color> if the target is successfully inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。対象が<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状態の場合、同じ対象に<color=#28d9ed>追加攻撃</color>を与える。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 부여합니다. 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color> 상태라면 동일한 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>추가 공격</color>을 사용합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率造成<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。若目标处于<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状态,则对该目标发动<color=#28d9ed>额外攻击</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Activates an additional attack\nIncreases Priority by 50%
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 追加攻撃100%発生\n行動ゲージ+50%
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 额外攻击必定触发\n行动值+50%

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Recovering Priority changes to gaining an extra turn
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 行動ゲージUPが追加ターンに変更
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 행동 게이지 회복이 추가 턴으로 변경
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 行动值恢复变更为额外回合

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Nine Inch Nails
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: ナイン・インチ・ネイルズ
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: When using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to <color=#28d9ed>remove all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> from a target, then attacks that target.\nThe damage is increased if the target has been inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: スキル使用時、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>すべて解除</color>し、敵単体にダメージを与える。\n対象が<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状態の場合、ダメージがUPする。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 스킬 사용 시 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>모두 해제</color>하고 적을 공격합니다.\n대상이 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color> 상태라면 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 使用技能时,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率使目标的<color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color><color=#28d9ed>全部解除</color>,并攻击敌人。\n若目标处于<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状态,则伤害提升。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, additionally reduces Weakness Gauge by <color=#28d9ed>2</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> 2 times on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、対象のWGを追加で<color=#28d9ed>2</color>DOWNさせる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>2個を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>2</color>의 WG를 추가로 감소시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 2회 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携收尾效果</color>:攻击后,使WG额外降低<color=#28d9ed>2</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率对目标造成2次<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
